item.title: How I Got to a Software Engineering Bootcamp
item.description: Hello, welcome to my blog! My name is Katherine Roll and I am currently a student in a software engineering boot camp at the Flatiron school. It is a 15-week course that teaches the skills required to become a full stack engineer. It’s a bit of a crazy story, how I ended up here, writing code for hours every day. To start, I graduated with a bachelor’s degree in mathematics from the University of Massachusetts in 2019.
